Name: EXAKT
Description: EXAKT (‘EXMARaLDA Analysis- and Concordance Tool’) is the query and analysis tool for EXMARaLDA corpora. It can also be used for corpora created with other tools (FOLKER, Transcriber, ELAN). Support is offered via the CLARIN-D Helpdesk. Manuals and how-to guides are available; there have also been training courses for EXAKT. The source code of the program is open source and accessible via GitHub.
Platform: Linux with a current Java runtime environment.
